fields.name: Description
fields.value:
Located in Toyama prefecture, Japan, P.A. Works is the anime studio that brought you beloved anime such as Angel Beats, Nagi no Asukara, Charlotte, and Shirobako! We want to gather PA Works fans and anime fans to just discuss shows or whatever is on your mind.

This is a server for anyone and everyone, so come on in even if you're not a fan! Here are some of the perks of joining us:
:small_blue_diamond: Getting updates on P.A. Works, their shows, and media
:small_blue_diamond: Access to Hitomi bot, which can do - Hugs, give points, and more!
:small_blue_diamond: Your own role based on your favorite P.A. Works anime!
